version_description:
• Added iCloud sync! Now your countdowns will sync across your iOS devices
• Bug fixes
• We translated the app to: Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian and Spanish

• We translated the app to: Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian and Spanish
• Bug fixes

• New icon!
• Small improvements
• You can now set your events to repeat yearly!
• Now you can sort your events from the closest to the most distant!

• Now you can sort your events from the closest to the most distant!
• We fixed a small bug

We are releasing a premium in-app purchase that lets you:
• Take a glance at your events with our widget
• Remove ads

Hope you like it!

• Remove ads

We are releasing a premium in-app purchase that lets you:
• Take a glance at your events with our widget
• Remove ads

We also fixed some small bugs.

We are releasing our most requested feature: Sharing!
• Now you will be able to share your events with friends and family
• If they have an iOS device they will be able to see the countdown in our app, just as you do.
• What happens if they don't

• Switch the app to Dark Mode permanently. To do so, go to your iOS device settings, scroll until you find Countdown, tap on it and activate the Dark Mode toggle.
